programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.

programme.title: Autumn In New York
programme.desc: A wealthy, charismatic New York restaurateur (Richard Gere) falls for a much younger hat designer (Winona Ryder) but their relationship is complicated by his philandering ways, his past connection to her family, and her debilitating illness. Jill Hennessey, Anthony LaPaglia, Sherry Stringfield and Elaine Stritch costar in this romantic melodrama.

Diagnosed with spinal cancer, 27 year old Adam (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) navigates the road to recovery with the sometimes-overbearing support of his crude best friend, Kyle (Seth Rogen), his smothering mother (Anjelica Huston) and an inexperienced therapist (Anna Kendrick). Inspired by a true story, 50/50 is an honest yet hysterically funny account of a young man's journey toward healing.(n)

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: As a way to pay off their mounting debts, lifelong pals Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) decide to write, direct and star in a pornographic movie, which they believe to be a sure moneymaker. But they may end up as the first couple in adult cinematic history that discovers long-hidden feelings for each other while doing so. Craig Robinson costars in this romantic sex comedy.(n)

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.(n)

programme.title: Dogville
programme.desc: Provocative and emotionally demanding, Lars von Trier's controversial allegory about the darker side of human nature and American arrogance has been likened to a hellish version of "Our Town." Into a small town - represented by chalk outlines and a few props - arrives a stranger (Nicole Kidman) in need of sanctuary. Initially welcoming, Dogville's citizens show their true colors once they listen to their paranoiac fears. This winner of more than 10 international awards costars Paul Bettany, James Caan, Patricia Clarkson and Lauren Bacall.(n)

programme.title: JIMI: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: André Benjamin stars as Jimi Hendrix in this revealing biopic from writer-director John Ridley ('12 Years A Slave'). Covering a transformative year in Hendrix's life from 1966-67, in which he went from a New York City backing musician to making his mark in London's music scene up until his Monterey Pop triumph, the film presents an intimate portrait of the sensitive young musician on the verge of becoming a rock legend.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Break
programme.desc: Peter Cattaneo ("The Full Monty") directs this British comedy starring James Nesbitt as Jimmy Hands, a raffish robber assigned to a grim correctional facility. When the prison's governor (Christopher Plummer) is persuaded to stage a production of a misguided musical based on the story of Admiral Nelson and Lady Emma Hamilton, Jimmy and his buddies seize the opportunity to plan a jailbreak. However, complicating matters is a lovely therapist (Olivia Williams), who, cast as Jimmy's costar, steals his heart. Timothy Spall and Lennie James costar.(n)

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel.(n)

programme.title: Employee of the Month (2006)
programme.desc: A slacker box boy (Dane Cook) at a New Mexico superstore tries to impress a gorgeous new coworker (Jessica Simpson) by transforming himself into a model corporate drone, but runs up against the previous 17-time holder (Dax Shepard) of the store's "employee of the month" honor.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: A woman emerges from a coma four years after taking a bullet to the head at her own wedding, and goes on an epic vendetta against her former boss and his deadly squad of international assassins in a kill or be-killed fight. Directed by Quentin Tarantino; stars Uma Thurman and Lucy Liu.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the Quentin Tarantino cult classic, a murderous bride continues her quest for vengeance against her former boss and lover and those who betrayed her, leading up to the ultimate confrontation with the man who ordered her execution. Stars Uma Thurman.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Break
programme.desc: Peter Cattaneo ("The Full Monty") directs this British comedy starring James Nesbitt as Jimmy Hands, a raffish robber assigned to a grim correctional facility. When the prison's governor (Christopher Plummer) is persuaded to stage a production of a misguided musical based on the story of Admiral Nelson and Lady Emma Hamilton, Jimmy and his buddies seize the opportunity to plan a jailbreak. However, complicating matters is a lovely therapist (Olivia Williams), who, cast as Jimmy's costar, steals his heart. Timothy Spall and Lennie James costar.(n)

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar.(n)

programme.title: Trouble in Paradise
programme.desc: Two sophisticated jewel thieves find themselves caught up in an unexpected love triangle when they set out to separate a Parisian widow from her fortune in gems.

programme.title: These Three
programme.desc: Lillian Hellman reworked “The Children's Hour” for this powerful story of two schoolteachers and a doctor victimized by a student's lie. Miriam Hopkins, Merle Oberon, Joel McCrea, Bonita Granville, Alma Kruger, Margaret Hamilton, Catherine Doucet. Rosalie: Marcia Mae Jones. Fine direction (William Wyler); splendid production (Samuel Goldwyn).

programme.title: The Story of Temple Drake
programme.desc: Adaptation of William Faulkner's "Sanctuary," about a reckless Southern belle and a bootlegger.

programme.title: Lady with Red Hair
programme.desc: Miriam Hopkins portrays the actress Mrs. Leslie Carter, who won theatrical fame in the 1890s with the help of producer David Belasco (Claude Rains). Mrs. Dudley: Laura Hope Crews. Payne: Richard Ainley. Bryant: John Litel. Mrs. Frazier: Helen Westley. Mrs. Brooks: Mona Barrie. Clifton: Victor Jory. Foster: Fritz Leiber. Chapman: Cecil Kellaway. Carter: Johnnie Russell. Brilliantly acted; colorful saga of the mauve era. Directed by Curtis Bernhardt.

programme.title: Wise Girl
programme.desc: An heiress (Miriam Hopkins) goes Bohemian to gain custody of her late sister's children from the father, a Greenwich Village artist (Ray Milland). Karl: Walter Abel. Fletcher: Henry Stephenson. O'Neil: Alec Craig. Mike: Guinn Williams. Mrs. Bell-Rivington: Margaret Dumont. Leigh Jason directed.

programme.title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
programme.desc: A kind-hearted and selfless doctor creates a serum that transforms him into a lecherous jerk. The good man attempts to win the heart of a virtuous woman, while his amoral alter-ego pursues a good-time girl.

programme.title: The Main Event
programme.desc: A Beverly Hills executive is bankrupted by her accountant, and to get back on top she must train a reluctant prizefighter with whom she has a contract, and get him back in the ring.

programme.title: What's Up, Doc?
programme.desc: Barbra Streisand and Ryan O'Neal play a mismatched couple in director Peter Bogdanovich's salute to the 1930s screwball comedies.

programme.title: The Owl and the Pussycat
programme.desc: Romance about a street-smart actress, model, and occasional prostitute who makes the acquaintance of an educated and straightlaced writer. The two end up living together, and although he is repulsed by her lifestyle and she can't stand his prudishness, their mutual attraction grows.

programme.title: Funny Girl
programme.desc: Barbra Streisand won an Oscar for her portrayal of legendary stage comedian Fanny Brice as she breaks into show business, rises to stardom with the Ziegfeld Follies and finds heartache in her marriage to big-time gambler Nicky Arnstein, who at first finds it amusing to be referred to as "Mr. Brice," but then begins to resent his wife's fame and fortune. Streisand actually shared the Best Actress Oscar that year with "The Lion in Winter" star Katharine Hepburn.

programme.title: Funny Lady
programme.desc: Barbra Streisand returns as Fanny Brice, portraying the musical comedy star's tempestuous life with her second husband, showman Billy Rose in the 1930s.

programme.title: The Way We Were
programme.desc: A tumultuous relationship between an effusive woman radical and a reticent, conservative man begins on a college campus in 1937, and struggles to remain intact throughout the coming decades. Oscars went to the title song and Marvin Hamlisch's score.

programme.title: Yentl
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Europe, a Jewish teenage girl disguises herself as a boy to be permitted to study the Talmud.

programme.title: The Prince of Tides
programme.desc: Barbra Streisand (who also directed) portrays a Manhattan psychiatrist who gets involved with her patient's brother and tries to exorcise the demons of their dysfunctional Southern family. An adaptation of the novel by Pat Conroy (who co-adapted with Becky Johnston). (cc).

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: A fading rock star falls for a young singer who quickly eclipses him in popularity as he descends further into alcoholism and drug addiction. (repeat).

programme.title: Up the Sandbox
programme.desc: Barbra Streisand offers one of her best non-musical performances as a hassled housewife who takes refuge in a fantasy world. David Selby. Elizabeth: Ariane Heller. Mrs. Yussim: Jane Hoffman. Yussim: John C. Becher. Fidel Castro: Jacobo Morales. Beineke: Paul Benedict. Keglin: George Irving. Irvin Kershner directed.

programme.title: Saratoga
programme.desc: A bookie and a horse farmer's daughter fall in love as they try to gamble back funds to eradicate a debt. Jean Harlow's final movie.

programme.title: It Happened One Night
programme.desc: Frank Capra's classic about a spoiled heiress on the lam from her father, and the gruff reporter who hooks up with her as they travel northward, engage in a series of misadventures and begin to fall for each other. The first film to sweep all five major Oscars: Best Picture, Director (Capra), Screenplay (Robert Riskin), Actor (Clark Gable) and Actress (Claudette Colbert).

programme.title: Comrade X
programme.desc: An American reporter in the U.S.S.R. writes anti-Soviet propaganda under an assumed name and, when he is discovered, is blackmailed into helping get a hotel porter's daughter out of the country.

programme.title: Band of Angels
programme.desc: A drama dealing with miscegenation in the Old South. Clark Gable, Yvonne DeCarlo, Sidney Poitier, Efrem Zimbalist Jr. Charles: Patric Knowles. Seth: Rex Reason. Canavan: Torin Thatcher. Miss Idell: Andrea King. Based on a novel by Robert Penn Warren. Directed by Raoul Walsh.

programme.title: Command Decision
programme.desc: A general (Clark Gable) must send his men to certain death in bombing raids over Germany. Kane: Walter Pidgeon. Evans: Van Johnson. Garnet: Brian Donlevy. Brockhurst: Charles Bickford. Martin: John Hodiak. Malcolm: Edward Arnold. Lee: Marshall Thompson. Goldberg: Cameron Mitchell. Literate and well acted; based on the play by William Wister Haines. Directed by Sam Wood.

programme.title: The King and Four Queens
programme.desc: A fugitive holes up in a ghost town with the matriarch of an outlaw quartet and the gunmen's four wives, who all make a play for him in hopes of him helping them get a share of the loot from the gang's latest stagecoach robbery.

programme.title: Adventure
programme.desc: A hard-living sailor finds it rough going after marrying a librarian and trying to adapt to domestic life.

programme.title: Run Silent Run Deep
programme.desc: A submarine commander and his executive officer clash during a search-and-destroy mission against a Japanese ship responsible for the earlier sinking of another U.S. sub. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Boom Town
programme.desc: Two friendly oil wildcatters make a fortune, but compete for the love of the same woman. When the one who wins her starts to cheat on her, the other tries to pay the mistress to go away so that the woman he still loves won't be heartbroken.(n)

programme.title: Mogambo
programme.desc: Remake of 1932's "Red Dust" is a saga of big-game hunting and romantic intrigue in Africa, where a raffish safari guide leads an expedition deep into the jungle and becomes the prey of an anthropologist's lustful wife. Clark Gable starred in both versions of the tale. Ava Gardner and Grace Kelly were nominated as Best Actress and Best Supporting Actress, respectively.(n)

programme.title: China Seas
programme.desc: A tramp-steamer captain sailing from China to Singapore begins a romance with an aristocratic Englishwoman, but when his jealous old flame notices, she sells him out to pirates out of spite.(n)

programme.title: Honky Tonk
programme.desc: Clark Gable and Lana Turner made a box-office team in this Western tale of a Boston maiden who lands a Casanova. Frank Morgan, Claire Trevor. Mrs. Varner: Marjorie Main. Hearn: Albert Dekker. Wells: Henry O'Neill. Sniper: Chill Wills. Pearl: Veda Ann Borg. Gaks: Harry Worth. Mrs. Wilson: Betty Blythe. Governor: Douglas Wood. Directed by Jack Conway.(n)

programme.title: Little Nellie Kelly
programme.desc: Musical about a lovely Irish lass who falls in love but has to deal with the disapproval of her father and grandfather.(n)

programme.title: Presenting Lily Mars
programme.desc: After meeting a producer, a small-town woman with big-city ambitions heads to Broadway seeking stardom, but following a series of disappointments the best she can manage is an understudy job, until getting her break when the star walks out on opening night.(n)

programme.title: The Clock
programme.desc: A GI on a 48-hour pass meets an attractive young lady under the huge clock at New York City's Pennsylvania Station and they undertake a whirlwind weekend romance and encounter a disparate cross-section of eccentric Big Apple dwellers.(n)

programme.title: Love Finds Andy Hardy
programme.desc: Andy finds himself the target of a lot of female attention as he prepares for the country club Christmas party, to which he had originally wanted to bring his girlfriend, Polly, until she announced she'd be going out of town for the holidays.(n)

programme.title: For Me and My Gal
programme.desc: A vaudeville team with a song-and-dance act are tested by one constantly using the other to get ahead, before they are both put to the real test by the arrival of World War I.(n)

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: A 19th-century traveling song-and-dance man impersonates a pirate to impress a bored heiress who is about to enter an arranged marriage with a wealthy older man on a Caribbean island. Gene Kelly and Judy Garland teamed up for the second time in this 1948 musical (the first was 1942's "For Me and My Gal").(n)

programme.title: In the Good Old Summertime
programme.desc: Two clerks in a turn-of-the-20th-century Chicago sheet-music store are intensely antagonistic toward each other, but unbeknownst to the two, they actually are getting very chummy as pen pals. A musical remake of "The Shop Around the Corner," in which the setting was changed from a Budapest sundries shop.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars Return of the Jedi
programme.desc: Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia and Han Solo return as the initial trilogy of George Lucas's "Star Wars" saga concludes. Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Harrison Ford, Billy Dee Williams. C3PO: Anthony Daniels. Chewbacca: Peter Mayhew. Emperor: Ian McDiarmid. Darth Vader: David Prowse. Voice of Darth Vader: James Earl Jones. (cc).

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a society where the population is segregated by personality, a teenager classified as "divergent" uncovers a plot to kill everyone in her category and races to find out why they are considered so uniquely dangerous. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Castle and Beckett hunt for a psychic's murderer while debating the validity of her profession. Then they receive a letter from the victim written the day of her death predicting her demise, but it could be the work of the killer. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Encoded evidence sparks Castle's imagination during the investigation into a bail bondsman's murder, but Beckett dismisses his wild theories. Meanwhile, Beckett's reunion with her ex-partner turns romantic, much to Castle's chagrin. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Castle posits time travel as a possible element in the murder of a mathematician shot by a 200-year-old bullet. A tricked-out DeLorean and a suspect in Victorian-era garb help support his theory, but a link to a secret society may explain everything. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The lawyer (Philip Bosco) of a mob don who's a suspect in a hit man's murder, insists his client is mentally unfit to stand trial. Johnny Di Maio: Michael Rispoli. Alberto Napoli: Frank Savino. Vickie: Katherine Narducci. Ronny: John O'Leary. Judge Larkin: Rochelle Oliver. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the murder of a psychologist who was involved in helping the Archdiocese to arrange annulments. Atkins: Jill Clayburgh. Molly: Haviland Morris. Redfield: Tony Roberts. Jim: John Wojda. Behrens:Tom O'Rourke (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A wicked witch escapes from her confinement in a magic mirror and sets out to vanquish the sisters by using enchanted props from various fairy tales. Meanwhile, Piper conjures up the spirit of her dead grandmother for advice on how to prepare for her baby's birth. Adam: Sean Patrick Flanery. Grams: Jennifer Rhodes. Evil Witch: Natalija Nogulich. Piper: Holly Marie Combs. Paige: Rose McGowan. Phoebe: Alyssa Milano. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Charmed

programme.desc: An Eastern European man is forced to live at JFK Airport after his visa is canceled due to a coup in his own country. In time, the terminal becomes a virtual country within itself, complete with culture, ambition, status, diversity and the need for love. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: A man who goes on the lam after he's wrongly convicted of killing his wife. As he scours the country looking for the true murderer, he is pursued be a relentless U.S. deputy marshal looking to bring him to justice. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: After realizing that they can't possibly afford the tuition for their daughter's college, a married couple team up with their eccentric neighbor to make money by running an illegal casino in the suburbs. programme.title: Passenger 57

programme.title: Ouija Origin of Evil

programme.title: Celebrity 100 Per Cent Hotter
programme.desc: Stylists Karen Williams, Daniel K Palmer and Melissa Sophia turn their aesthetic attentions to two celebrities whose distinctive images are not doing them any favours. Will prickly pundit John McCririck allow hair stylist Daniel anywhere near his sideburns? The team also turn their attentions to Jemma Lucy, star of `Ex on the Beach', and give her a more sophisticated look that will still wow the cameras.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity 100 Per Cent Hotter
programme.desc: Transgender singer Lauren Harries and former Geordie Shore veteran Holly Hagan hotstep it into the Hot Spot to see how their current looks rate with the public.(n)

programme.title: 100 Per Cent Hotter

programme.sub-title: Stand Up and Deliver: Kevin D

programme.title: One Night with My Ex
programme.desc: Another three ex-couples spend a night alone together, featuring young parents Scott and Laura, who ended their relationship after Scott's infidelity left Laura unable to trust him. Plus, couple Chloe and Christian who broke up at university try to make amends, and Sophie and Luke spend the night together after two years apart.(n)

programme.title: Shock Docs
programme.sub-title: Body Freaks: Make Me a Perfect 10
programme.desc: Documentary following British people hooked on risky cosmetic procedures in the pursuit of body perfection. They include Sam who had Botox at 17 and spent £20,000 on his teeth, and Jacqui who makes a living by taking selfies. Cameras also focus on Ryan, who used Chinese foot-binding to shrink himself from a size 10 to a 6.5, and body-building twins Delroy and Trevor who compete over everything.(n)

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.

programme.title: Dzień dobry

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.(n)

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.(n)

programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.(n)

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.(n)

Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.desc: Gospodarz programu Filip "Rudy" Rudanacja zaprasza do swojego garbusa znane i lubiane gwiazdy show-biznesu. Podczas wspólnej przejażdżki nie zawaha się zapytać swojego gościa o wszystko, na co ma ochotę i co chcieliby usłyszeć widzowie.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.(n)

programme.title: Little Roy
programme.desc: Roy wishes he had a cartoon, little brother who wants to play all the time. Not a big sister who gets mad at him. Nodding off, a dream bubble above his head shows Roy playing with Zip-a little, cartoon brother. When Roy wakes up, he is thrilled to find that Zip has hopped out of his dream and into reality. But things don't quite go according to plan! Roy steps out of his room to find an upturned laundry basket on the landing and clothes everywhere! In the kitchen, Zip wolfs down a cake, and out in the garden he creates a grass whirlwind over Bill's newly mowed lawn. While Roy cleans up Zip's mess with a rake, he tells Tristan all about his cartoon brother who escaped from his dream and is causing havoc. Roy realises that having a cartoon brother who wants to play all the time, might not always be such fun. Roy knows they have to get Zip back to Dreamland and wonders - What would Wonder Roy do? In Toonville, The Messer is wreaking havoc, until Wonder Roy puts a halt to his shenanigans by bringing in The Messer's mother, wisely working out that everyone gets homesick. Back in reality, Tristan and Roy work together to show Zip what he's missing in Dreamland? endless cakes and endless fun! Zip leaps onto Roy's bed and bounces into the dream bubble. Lesson learned, Roy tidies the bedroom for Becky. He finishes, just in the nick of time, as Becky arrives home with some cake to share with her favourite, little cartoon brother.
